structure.unit: TITLE TO PROPERTY AND RESTRICTIONS ON USE, OWNERSHIP, AND ALIENATION

law.text: Before conveying real estate to the association, the declarant shall have that real estate released from all liens, the foreclosure of which would deprive unit owners of any right of access to or easement of support of their units.
law.history: Created 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 97, sec. 53, effective January 1, 2011.
